definition: to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: I am holding a licence to possess the concerned irradiating apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 本人正持有牌照管有該輻照儀器。

sentences.english: If the holder loses the interest, it's no big deal.
sentences.chinese: 如果持有人失去了利息，這樣就不會有大的交易。

sentences.english: Would this change affect existing student visa holders?
sentences.chinese: 鐒這項變革對現行的學生簽證持有者有影響嗎？

sentences.english: You must get a permit if you want to keep a gun.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想持有一支槍，你必須弄一張許可證。

sentences.english: The tangency portfolio is the portfolio that one should hold.
sentences.chinese: 切點投資組合就是我們應該持有的投資組合。

sentences.english: Celestite holds the vibration of underwater worlds in the language of light.
sentences.chinese: 天青石持有光之語中水下世界的振動。

sentences.english: The Permit Holder shall provide portable toilet for the on- site construction workforce.
sentences.chinese: 許可證持有人須爲駐工地建築工人提供流動洗手間。

sentences.english: This will give Yahoo direct and indirect ownership of 37 per cent of Alibaba.com.
sentences.chinese: 此舉將令雅虎直接和間接持有阿里巴巴37%的股權。

sentences.english: But Gnosticism is opposed to an historicist view of Christianity.
sentences.chinese: 但是靈知主義反對對基督教持有一種歷史主義的視角。

sentences.english: Isn't there a problem in one of the players owning the scorecard that everybody uses?
sentences.chinese: 一位玩家持有衆人使用的記分卡，這難道沒有問題麼？
甚至毛也持有類似的觀點。

sentences.english: Please ensure that all the account holder(s) or authorized signatories sign this exchange form.
sentences.chinese: 請帳戶持有人或法人代表於此處簽名。

sentences.english: Shareholdings held by a Member's spouse and infant children are not registrable.
sentences.chinese: 委員的配偶及未成年子女所持有的股份無須登記。

sentences.english: The bet is that holding yuan-denominated assets is an important feature of a diversified national reserve.
sentences.chinese: 持有人民幣資產是國家儲備多樣化的重要特徵。

sentences.english: If you share that view, then you should read this book.
sentences.chinese: 如果你也持有這種觀點，那你也該讀讀這本書。

sentences.english: Supplier must have purchase order number which was provided by Purchasing.
sentences.chinese: 供應商必須持有采購部提供的採購單號。

definition: to own a controlling number of shares in a company
to undertake to purchase sth/to subscribe (to share issue)
to sell/to offer for sale/to put on the market
consideration (in exchange for shares)/a quid pro quo
